law.catch_line: Functions of Capital City Airport Division -- Authority for administrative regulations.

text.section:
Subject to the approval of the department and in accordance with applicable state and federal statutes and regulations, the Capital City Airport Division shall promulgate administrative regulations under KRS Chapter 13A to:
Establish user fees to be paid by users of the services and facilities of the Capital City Airport for charges including, but not limited to, hangar fees, tie-down fees, fuel, and aircraft supplies; and
Establish fees for the usage of state aircraft.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 13, sec. 18, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 605, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
